parameters.name: NumRefs
parameters.description: Number of external references

parameters.name: ModelPathName
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of path names of documents of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: CompPathName
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of path names of referenced components of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: Feature
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of in-context items (sketches, features, and so on) of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: DataType
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the type data used to create the items (converted edge or face, converted or offset sketch entity, body, and so on) of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Array of statuses of the external references as defined in swExternalReferenceStatus_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: RefEntity
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of actual items being used and the names of the documents that contain the items of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: FeatComp
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the components in which the affected features exist of size NumRefs; this information is only displayed when one or more RefEntity is in a different component in an assembly and does not apply to derived parts VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined by swExternalFileReferencesConfig_e

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration when configOption is swExternalFileReferencesNamedConfig

title: IModelDocExtension.IListExternalFileReferences
description: Gets the names and statuses of the external file references on this part or assembly.
signature:
void IListExternalFileReferences( 
   System.Int32
NumRefs
,
   out System.String
ModelPathName
,
   out System.String
CompPathName
,
   out System.String
Feature
,
   out System.String
DataType
,
   out System.Int32
Status
,
   out System.String
RefEntity
,
   out System.String
FeatComp
,
   out System.Int32
ConfigOption
,
   out System.String
ConfigName
)

parameters.name: NumRefs
parameters.description: Number of external references

parameters.name: ModelPathName
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of path names of documents of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: CompPathName
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of path names of referenced components of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: Feature
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of in-context items (sketches, features, and so on) of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: DataType
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the type data used to create the items (converted edge or face, converted or offset sketch entity, body, and so on) of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Array of statuses of the external references as defined in swExternalReferenceStatus_e VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: RefEntity
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of actual items being used and the names of the documents that contain the items of size NumRefs VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: FeatComp
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the components in which the affected features exist of size NumRefs; this information is only displayed when one or more RefEntity is in a different component in an assembly and does not apply to derived parts VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined by swExternalFileReferencesConfig_e

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration when configOption is swExternalFileReferencesNamedConfig

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDocExtension::ListExternalFileReferencesCount
to specify NumRefs.
